attributes.action: Cut foreign aid and direct it properly
attributes.additional_details:
We need to reduce foreign aid levels as we are spending far too much on it.

We need to direct foreign aid properly to benefit those in the worst circumstances and to help third world countries develop and be self-independent.

We must help with giving vaccinations to the sick, clean water and sanitation, delivering food to the poorest and provide secure lives to those in distress. However, foreign aid has been given to corrupt governments, dictators and wasted uselessly, funding vicious organisations.

We must get a grip on our foreign aid and help it reach those who need it. By focusing our foreign aid to help people and focus on International Development helping countries to develop as opposed to International give away's, we can help the world properly and hopefully reduce our foreign aid budget.
